title: Infernal Mace
content:
ditional 3 Poison damage and can possibly Poison its target.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Precise infernal runes are woven into this weapon's filigree, implying a creator well-versed in hellish arcana.

Infernal Mace is one of the Mace Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Infernal Mace is an enchanted mace that deals a fixed amount of extra poison damage on hit. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippab
